Reference

All functions

abundance_palette()

eBird Status and Trends color palettes for mapping

bernoulli_dev()

Bernoulli deviance

binom_test_p()

Binomial test for ensemble support

calc_bins()

Calculates relative abundance bins (breaks) based for mapping

calc_full_extent()

Calculate the spatial extent of non-zero data in a raster

date_to_st_week()

Get the Status and Trends week that a date falls into

ebirdst

ebirdst: Tools to Load, Map, Plot, and Analyze eBird Status and Trends Data Products

ebirdst_download()

Download eBird Status and Trends Data

ebirdst_extent()

Construct a spatiotemporal extent object to subset Status and Trends data

ebirdst_habitat() plot(<ebirdst_habitat>)

eBird Status and Trends predictive habitat associations

ebirdst_ppms() plot(<ebirdst_ppms>)

eBird Status and Trends predictive performance metrics (PPMs)

ebirdst_ppms_ts() plot(<ebirdst_ppms_ts>)

Time series of eBird Status and Trends PPMs summarized temporally

ebirdst_predictors

eBird Status and Trends predictors

ebirdst_runs

Data frame of available eBird Status and Trends species

sample_grid() sample_case_control()

Spatiotemporal sampling of points on a grid

ebirdst_subset()

Subset eBird Status and Trends data spatiotemporally

ebirdst_weeks

eBird Status and Trends weeks

get_species()

Get eBird species code for a set of species

get_species_path()

Get the data package path for a given species

label_raster_stack()

Label data cubes with the week date for each band

load_config()

Load eBird Status and Trends configuration file

load_fac_map_parameters()

Load full annual cycle map parameters

load_pds()

Load eBird Status and Trends partial dependence data

load_pis()

Load eBird Status and Trends predictor importance data

load_predictions()

Load eBird Status and Trends test data predictions

load_raster()

Load eBird Status and Trends raster data cubes

load_stixels()

Load summary data for eBird Status and Trends stixels

parse_raster_dates()

Parse data cube layer names into dates

plot_pds()

Plot partial dependency (PD) line plots

plot_pis()

Plot predictor importance (PI) box plots

poisson_dev()

Poisson deviance

project_extent()

Transform a spatiotemporal extent to a different CRS

set_ebirdst_access_key()

Store the eBird Status and Trends access key

stixel_footprint() plot(<stixel_footprint>)

Calculate the spatial footprint of a set of stixels

stixelize()

Generate polygons for eBird Status and Trends stixels
